name: Terror on Garand IV
description:
Terror on Garand IV is a short immersive-sim style FPS game made for the GoGodotJam 2 game jam.

As a space pilot, your ship runs out of fuel and you must desperately explore the surface of Garand IV for any ways to refuel or else you will be stranded.

---

Most assets were created within the time frame of the jam. External resources are listed in the game credits.

Only a windows download version is available because of the project size (~800 megabytes when extracted).

---

Specs: This game has been tested on a GTX 1060 and runs at 60 fps and for higher framerates I recommend an RTX 2070 or higher

---
